originalTitle: Ugandan MP and Bobi Wine ally arrested over election violence
title: Ugandan MP and Bobi Wine ally arrested over election violence
content: The opposition politician is accused of election violence in which at least seven people were killed.

originalTitle: Slashed incomes and gamers go cold turkey: the fallout from Uganda's internet shutdown
title: Slashed incomes and gamers go cold turkey: the fallout from Uganda's internet shutdown
content: The internet was shut during the general election, leaving many people without any income - or entertainment.

originalTitle: Guinea-Bissau coup leaders set December election date
title: Guinea-Bissau coup leaders set December election date
content: Regional powers Ecowas had previously warned junta head Horta N'Tam against such a long wait for elections.

originalTitle: A Song for My Land: Children highlight pesticide use in Argentina
title: A Song for My Land: Children highlight pesticide use in Argentina
content: A teacher and his students in rural Argentina use music to raise the alarm about the dangers of pesticide spraying.

originalTitle: Why did Israel join Trump’s ‘Board of Peace’ after raising objections?
title: Why did Israel join Trump’s ‘Board of Peace’ after raising objections?
content: Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu's flip-flop is part of disruption tactics to stall any peace in Gaza, say analysts.

originalTitle: Who were the Palestinian journalists Israeli forces just killed?
title: Who were the Palestinian journalists Israeli forces just killed?
content: Three Palestinian journalists were killed in a targeted Israeli strike in Gaza while working for an aid organisation.

originalTitle: What we know about Trump's  'framework of future deal' over Greenland
title: What we know about Trump's  'framework of future deal' over Greenland
content: Denmark and Greenland have made it clear they will not relinquish sovereignty of the world's largest island.

originalTitle: Two dead and several missing in New Zealand landslides
title: Two dead and several missing in New Zealand landslides
content: Heavy rains have ravaged the country's North Island, with a minister comparing it to a "war zone".

originalTitle: UK holds off joining Trump's Board of Peace over Putin concerns
title: UK holds off joining Trump's Board of Peace over Putin concerns
content: Foreign Secretary Yvette Cooper says the Russian president has shown no commitment to peace in Ukraine.

originalTitle: 'Ridiculous amount of games' - has Haaland played too much football?
title: 'Ridiculous amount of games' - has Haaland played too much football?
content: Erling Haaland made a blistering start to the season but that prolific run of form has ground to a halt with only one goal in his past eight games.

originalTitle: 'Unique' Rogers looks to prove worth for Villa & England
title: 'Unique' Rogers looks to prove worth for Villa & England
content: Morgan Rogers says he "can be anything" - while the Aston Villa star is talking about his positional flexibility, rather than boasting about his quality, his confidence is well-placed.

originalTitle: Spurs' Bergvall 'facing up to three months out'
title: Spurs' Bergvall 'facing up to three months out'
content: Tottenham Hotspur are awaiting on a final diagnosis on Lucas Bergvall's ankle injury amid early concerns he faces up to three months on the sidelines.
